data.title: All the Celebrity Pregnancy Announcements of 2023
data.meta_description: Celebrities who made pregnancy announcements in 2023: Emily Atack, Darren Criss, Hilary Duff, Ashanti, and more.
data.text:
Emily Atack

The Inbetweeners alum and comedian Emily Atack revealed that sheâ€™s expecting her first child! She shared the news on her Instagram with the caption reading, â€œHello Everyone, itâ€™s been a little while but Iâ€™m back with some news. Iâ€™m delighted to share with you all that weâ€™re having a baby!! Iâ€™ve never been so happy and utterly terrified at the same time. Please go easy on me â¤ï¸ Every day is mixed with thrill, fear, joy, hysteria, topped off with a lot of vomiting â€“ a bit like when youâ€™ve just stepped off of the Oblivion at Alton Towers on a hangover. Iâ€™ve got to know my body on such an insane level. Itâ€™s made me appreciate the one Iâ€™ve been given SO much, Iâ€™m doing my absolute best to make it a home for the little squid Iâ€™m growing. We can already sense the baby is reclined on a mattress of peanut butter and jam sandwiches in there, demanding more chocolate buttons. Iâ€™m so happy to be writing all of this to you all. Youâ€™ve always stuck by me through the years, do stick around to watch me enter my mum era. Christ. Letâ€™s go.â€

Kane Brown & Katelyn Brown

Kane Brown and wife Katelyn Brown had a special gift to share with the world on Christmas 2023. Theyâ€™re expecting Baby No. 3! The Browns posted a sweet photo on Instagram with them and their young daughters â€” Kingsley Rose and Kodi Jane â€” all snuggled up on the couch in front of their tree. Kingsley proudly holds up a sonogram photo.

â€œLast Christmas of 4 ğŸ„â¤ï¸ Merry Christmas everyone!!,â€ the â€œBury Me in Georgiaâ€ singer captioned the joint post.

Fellow country music stars were quick to offer their congratulations in the comments. â€œAHHH congrats!!!!!â€ Maddie Marlow said. â€œğŸ™ŒğŸ™ŒğŸ™ŒğŸ™ŒğŸ™ŒğŸ™Œâ€ Jessie James Decker commented. â€œScreaming for yall!!! Congrats!!!â€ Priscilla Block added

Mia Swier & Darren Criss

Glee alum Darren Criss announced that he and wife Mia Swier are expecting Baby No. 2 in what one follower called â€œthe most incredible pregnancy announcement ever.â€

Criss posted a photoshopped version of the Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again movie poster in which his face is over Meryl Streepâ€™s, Miaâ€™s is over Amanda Seyfriend, and their daughter Bluesyâ€™s is over Lily Jamesâ€™s. Sooo Mia is his daughter and his 1-year-old is his younger self? Uhâ€¦? Weâ€™ll just go with it.

â€œAnd COMING SOONâ€¦letâ€™s hope the sequel is better than the photoshop âœŒï¸ğŸ¤ª â€¼ï¸â€ Criss captioned the post.

There are also two positive pregnancy tests on the poster which has followers wondering if there are twins on the way.

â€œUr hilarious. CONGRATULATIONS ğŸ‰ğŸ¾,â€ actress Vanessa Hudgens commented.

â€œonly you to announce it like this Iâ€™m crying,â€ one follower said.

â€œDADren criss the sequel,â€ another commented.

â€œCreed IIIâ€ Ashley Cain Premiere â€“ Arrivals

Two years after his 8-month-old daughter Azaylia Diamond tragically died from Leukemia, Ashley Cain is sharing the happy news that he is expecting a baby.

The Challenge star told The Sun on Sunday he is expecting a baby boy with someone he dated earlier this year who he has known since he was 18.

â€œI got a message saying that she needed to speak to me so I went to see her and she told me she was pregnant â€” I canâ€™t put into words how that felt,â€ he said.

â€œI believe, after having Azaylia, that I was put on this earth to be a father,â€ he continued. â€œAnd then the thought of potentially having another child after losing one was very difficult to understand for meâ€¦Even though this next part of my journey is going to be hard, I truly understand that every child that comes into this world is a blessing.â€

Shanae Ankney & Nate Ebner

The Bachelor alum Shanae Ankney & and her boyfriend Nate Ebner, are expecting their first baby together, per PEOPLE. In the exclusive reveal, Ankney said she knew she was pregnant before she even took the pregnancy test back in July.

â€œI just had a gut feeling,â€ she said. â€œWe waited and waited for the double lines to show up, and boom! The double lines appeared.â€

â€œNate and I were looking at each other, just smiling and in awe.â€

Ebner said he already knows Ankney will be â€œthe absolute bestâ€ mom to their little girl.

â€œI think Shanae is a wonderful human with a beautiful soul, and I canâ€™t wait to watch her be an amazing mother to our childâ€¦she has so much love to give,â€ the NFL star said.

Ashley Benson & Brandon Davis

Ashley Benson is reportedly going to be a mom! Us Weekly confirmed that the Pretty Little Liars star is pregnant with her first baby with fiancÃ© Brandon Davis.

â€œSheâ€™s around the four month [mark] and so excited to be a mom, sheâ€™s been eating really well and taking care of her body,â€ a source told Us Weekly. â€œAshleyâ€™s family is also thrilled for her.â€

Insiders added that the Spring Breakers actress has â€œalways wanted to be a mom.â€ They went on to say, â€œShe wanted to start a family with Brandon. It was something that was extremely important to him and was vocalized from the very beginning. She initially wasnâ€™t expecting to have kids at this time in her life but that changed after falling so deeply in love with him.â€

Brant Daugherty & Kim Daugherty

Pretty Little Liars alum Brant Daugherty and his wife Kim Daugherty are expecting baby number two!

The coupleâ€™s firstborn son Wilder, 2, helped announce the exciting news. â€œI told him, â€˜Youâ€™re going to be a big brother, now go tell Daddy,'â€ Kim told E! News. â€œAnd he brought the box over to Brant and gave it to him.â€

â€œMy toddler just came up to me with a box and I had no idea what it was!â€ Brant said, adding that it wasnâ€™t too big of a surprise for him. â€œWe had been trying,â€ Brant admitted, â€œso the surprise didnâ€™t blow my mind, but it was exciting.â€

The couple are expecting their second son on New Yearâ€™s Day 2024.

Chloe Bridges & Adam Devine

Chloe Bridges and Adam Devine are expecting their first baby together, and of course the announcement was hilarious!

â€œLook weâ€™re pregnant!â€ Devine captioned an Instagram post with a photo of the two of them standing back-to-back, cradling their bumps.

â€œWell, Iâ€™m just fat now but Chloe is all preggo with a human baby!â€ the The Righteous Gemstones star continued. â€œObviously, very exciting stuff! This will mostly be a baby page now, as I will be dedicating my life to my child in hopes he doesnâ€™t use my decades of recorded dirty jokes against me.â€

Bridges shared her own post which was flooded with heart emojis and congratulatory messages. â€œWe have news!! ğŸ¤°ğŸ» canâ€™t wait to get this lil family started,â€ the actress captioned photos of the two of them standing on a dock.

Gabby Barrett & Cade Foehner

Gabby Barrett and Cade Foehner announced that Baby No. 3 is on the way! The country music singers shared the news with a carousel on Instagram with the caption, â€œSWIPE for a surprise ğŸ©· #livingthedream.â€ The first picture is of the two sitting on the stage and Foehner is kissing Barrettâ€™s cheek. The next is of a speaker placed on the stage in front of them with the words â€œBaby #3â€ on it, and the last is a video of Barrett listening to the babyâ€™s heartbeat.

â€œCONGRATS YOU GUYS!!!!! Woooooooooo!!!!,â€ fellow former American Idol contestant Colton Dixon commented.

They are also parents of Baylah May, 2, and Augustine Boone, who is almost a year old.

Uzo Aduba & Robert Sweeting

Uzo Aduba made a major red carpet reveal at the 76th Tony Awards on June 11. The Orange is The New Black actor is expecting her first child with her husband, filmmaker Uzo Aduba & Robert Sweeting.

She then confirmed the news on Instagram, sharing a video of her holding an infant bodysuit. â€œWhat a blessing,â€ she captioned the post. â€œ..I am beyond excited I get to be someoneâ€™s mommy! I know as the three of us continue to grow, our only, ONLY goal will be to love you, little one. My goodness. Look what God has done.â€

Viola Davis and Oprah Daily quickly jumped in the comments, congratulating the actor and leaving red heart emojis.

â€œCongratulations darling,â€ Laverne Cox wrote.

Janai Norman

Good Morning America anchor Janai Norman surprised her co-hosts Whit Johnson, Gio Benitez, and Somara Theodore with a pregnancy announcement on Sunday. While seeming to start the â€œOh, baby!â€ segment in which she talks about baby animals, Norman revealed that she and her husband are expecting baby number three.

â€œWe talk about baby animals, but this one, itâ€™s about our favorite types of babies, human babies,â€ she said. â€œIâ€™m having another one.â€

A cannon with pink confetti went off and her surprised co-hosts jumped to their feet to hug her. â€œYou kept a secret from me! How did you keep this secret?!â€ Johnson asked again and again.

PEOPLE then published an exclusive where Norman said sheâ€™s been â€œmanifestingâ€ this. â€œIâ€™ve been very open about wanting to have a third,â€ she said. â€œJust before I found out I told friends at lunch â€˜I really feel like things are starting to clear out to allow me to welcome the blessing.'â€

Becca Kufrin & Thomas Jacobs

Bachelor In Paradise couple Becca Kufrin and fiancÃ© Thomas Jacobs are expecting their first baby. The little one will join two older dog siblings, which the couple incorporated in their sweet announcement.

â€œParty of 5 coming September 2023,â€ Kufrin wrote on Instagram yesterday. She also included several pictures of her, Jacobs, and their dogs. In one, Jacobs kisses Kufrinâ€™s baby bump. In another, they show a sleeve of sonogram pictures to their dogs. They even include one adorable picture of the two dogs looking at their parents, with her corgi, Minno, looking wide-eyed and happy and Jacobsâ€™ big brown dog named Leo moping on the bed. Itâ€™s hard adjusting to a new sibling!

At the end, they include a little video from the ultrasound showing the wiggly baby.

â€œLittle Bebe, we canâ€™t wait to meet you, hold you, and watch you grow,â€ she continued in her caption. â€œWe already love you to the moon and back â€“ mom & dad.â€

Several Bachelor alum commented. â€œWait, what!!!! Congratulations!!!! ğŸ˜ğŸ¥¹,â€ Wells Adams wrote.

Adam Gottschalk said, â€œOmg!! At first I was like youâ€™re having triplets!?! ğŸ˜± took me a sec to count the fur babies ğŸ˜‚ congrats mama to be! â¤ï¸â€

Raven Gates Gottschalk said, â€œAw Congrats Becca!!!! â¤ï¸â¤ï¸ the best chapter of your life so far is about to start ğŸ¤—ğŸ¤±ğŸ».â€

Tia Booth said, â€œEEEEEEPPPP!!! Canâ€™t wait to rub on that belly!!!!â€ She commented again, â€œSo so happy for you guys!!!! My heart could burst!â€

Serena Pitt said, â€œIâ€™m screaming!!!! So so happy for you both â¤ï¸â¤ï¸.â€â€™

â€œMassive news! Congrats ğŸˆ,â€ Ben Higgens wrote. Ashley Iaconetti said, â€œOhhh myyyy gosh!!!! Congratulations!!! Ahh.â€

â€œYayyyy!!!!! So happy for you guys! ğŸ«¶ğŸ¼â€ said Hannah Godwin.

Caelynn Miller-Keyes wrote, â€œCongratulations!!!â€ Kaitlyn Bristowe said, â€œThis is incredible.â€

Congratulations to the family of five!

Jimmie Allen & Alexis Allen

Country singer Jimmy Allen and his wife Alexis shared some major life news in April 2023. The couple said they are expecting their third child together and also separating.

â€œAfter much thought and reflection in recent months, Lex & I have made the decision to separate,â€ they each wrote on Instagram. â€œAs we navigate this life change, we can also share that we will be welcoming another child together later this year.â€

â€œOur number one priority is and always will be ensuring that our children are healthy, happy and loved, and we remain committed to co-parenting with love and respect for one another,â€ the statement continued. â€œIn light of our growing family, we respectfully request privacy during this time.â€

The couple shares daughters Naomi, 3 and Zara, 18 months, and Jimmie has a son, Aadyn, 8 from a previous relationship.

Yamiche Alcindor & Nathaniel Cline

After four years of IVF treatment, NBC News Washington correspondent Yamiche Alcindor announced in April 2023 that she and her husband, journalist Nathaniel Cline, are expecting a baby boy in June.

â€œIt is the most incredible, exciting, life-affirming thing for me to have a baby on the way,â€ she wrote in a piece for Today.com, â€œespecially because it comes after years of disappointment, ugly crying, and carrying around a deep sense of shame that my body couldnâ€™t do what everyone elseâ€™s body seemed to do so easily.â€

The journalist said she has been â€œfeverishly chasing motherhood,â€ and that she â€œagonizedâ€ over sharing this news.

â€œI am both deeply grateful for this incredible blessing and deeply aware of how reading yet another pregnancy announcement might hurt women who are still struggling to become mothers,â€ she wrote. â€œThatâ€™s why I knew in my heart that I couldnâ€™t post a photo of my growing stomach with a cheery announcementâ€¦it would not be genuine of me to do that, because Iâ€™ve found myself in tears reading those sorts of announcements, feeling agony knowing that unfortunately, that was not my reality.â€

She went on to tell women struggling with infertility that she empathizes with their struggles and any shame they may feel. She also shared how hard it was to force herself to smile while reporting live after getting calls from doctors with bad news.

â€œMaybe this is the thing that people donâ€™t talk about enough: IVF, while widely used, can still feel like a lonely, all-encompassing hell when youâ€™re in the middle of it,â€ she said. â€œâ€¦As I think about the road Iâ€™ve traveled, Iâ€™m profoundly grateful to have an employer that offset the cost of this fertility ordeal. Iâ€™m aware of how many women donâ€™t have that option and wonâ€™t be able to access healthcare that helps make their dreams come true. My heart is with you as you try to get the help you need and want.â€

Russell Dickerson & Kailey Dickerson

Country music star Russell Dickerson and his wife Kailey are expecting their second child.

â€œGod gave me aâ€¦. BOY!â€ the â€œGod Gave Me a Girlâ€ singer captioned his super sweet pregnancy announcement on Instagram. In the video, Kailey flaunts a positive pregnancy test before giving two to her son Remington to bring to his dad. We then see Dickersonâ€™s excited reaction to the news.

The family of three had a private gender reveal at home that had a crucial mishap. The babyâ€™s gender was in the subject line of the email, so Dickerson knew the results right away. And so he threw a surprise party for his wife filled with blue balloons and little boy bodysuits.

A smiley Remington appears throughout the video, but Russell told The TODAY Show that heâ€™s unphased by his little brother. â€œHeâ€™s 2Â½, so it wasnâ€™t like the most mind-blowing thing,â€ Russell joked. â€œWeâ€™re like, â€˜Hey, youâ€™re going to be a big brother, thereâ€™s a baby in the belly.â€™ Heâ€™s like â€˜Alright cool, just give me some crackers.'â€

Tan France

Tan France & husband Rob are expecting their second child this summer, and they are so excited to give their son Ismael, 21 months, a little sibling.

â€œWe wanted him to have someone that will be his person that heâ€™s tethered to,â€ France told PEOPLE exclusively. â€œIâ€™m really close with my siblings and my husband is really close with his, so we wanted to create a family where [our child] would have more support other than just Rob and I.â€

The Queer Eye star said he and Rob were â€œover the moonâ€ when they found out in Dec. 2022 that their surrogate was pregnant.

â€œIt was the best feeling ever,â€ he said. â€œI mean, it felt almost as shocking as the first time. I was overjoyed, in tears, I couldnâ€™t believe that it had finally happened again.â€

Jessica & Clay Walker

Clay Walker announced via press release in early April that he and his wife, Jessica, are expecting their sixth child this fall â€” a little girl. Tragically, the couple then announced two weeks later that they suffered a miscarriage.

â€œThe whole family had been waiting for the baby and it was really, just a huge blow,â€ Walker told PEOPLE. â€œWe had her room ready, her clothes bought â€” everything, and her name, Eleanora Lindsey. So, it was a nightmare and still is for my wife. We were at 20 weeks, and weâ€™d already made it through the toughest part. Weâ€™ve had five successful full-term pregnancies and five beautiful children. Itâ€™s tough.â€

The couple shares Christiaan, 2, Ezra, 5, Elijah 10, Mary-Elizabeth, 13, and William, 14. The country musician also has two adult daughters, Skylor and MaClay, from a previous relationship.

Luke Combs & Nicole Combs

Country music star Luke Combs knows now more than ever that the sentiment behind his song â€œWhen It Rains It Poursâ€ is true. Combs announced in March 2023 that he and his wife Nicole are expecting their second son, and boy they are about to have their hands full.

â€œJoining the 2 under 2 club!â€ Combs captioned his Instagram announcement which includes photos of him and Nicole holding their son, Tex Lawrence. The 9-month-old rocks an adorable â€œBig Brotherâ€ top, prepping for the arrival of his little brother who is due in September.

â€œI would have the audio turned on for this post if I were yâ€™all,â€ Combs commented on the post. The reel is set to a preview clip from his new song, â€œTake You With Me.â€

â€œCongrats yâ€™all!!â€ commented fellow country music singer Chris Lane. â€œBuckle up..itâ€™s wild ğŸ¤ .â€

â€œYAY YAY YAY! So happy for you guys!â€ Shawn Johnson said.

Da Brat & Jesseca â€œJudyâ€ Harris-Dupart

Da Brat is expecting a baby with wife Jesseca â€œJudyâ€ Harris-Dupart, the 48-year-old rapper told PEOPLE.

â€œItâ€™s been quite a journey,â€ she said, â€œthereâ€™s a lot of stuff we learned about women over the age of 40.â€

The coupleâ€™s road to motherhood started around the time they said â€œI doâ€ back on Feb. 2 of last year. Harris-Dupart, 41, is the CEO of Kaleidoscope Hair Products and was in the midst of launching a new line inspired by Da Brat and her iconic braids and protective hairstyles.

Harris-Dupart is a mother of three from a prior relationship, and she and Da Brat didnâ€™t expect to have kids.

â€œI just thought it wasnâ€™t in the cards for me,â€ Da Brat said. â€œIâ€™ve had a great career, a full life. I felt like, because I didnâ€™t get pregnant earlier on, then it just wasnâ€™t going to happen for me.â€

The coupleâ€™s fertility journey started in Feb. 2022. After being convinced to carry the baby, Da Brat endured a complicated egg retrieval process and suffered a miscarriage before becoming pregnant in the fall of 2022.

â€œItâ€™s just a blessing,â€ she said. â€œIâ€™m excited!â€

Anthony Michael Hall & Lucia Hall

Anthony Michael Hall, 54 and his wife Lucia, 32 will become first-time parents this summer. The couple plans to name their son Michael Anthony Hall II after Anthony. The Breakfast Club actor was born Michael Anthony Hall but changed his name when he learned there was another actor named Michael Hall.

â€œWe were kissing, hugging, and thanking God [when we found out],â€ Anthony told PEOPLE. â€œWe immediately started dancing and laughing in our bathroom to celebrate the great news.â€

Anthony said Lucia has been â€œa champâ€ who is â€œtending to every important detail as a proud, expectant mother-to-be.â€ Meanwhile, he has been handling what is in his control.

â€œAs a new father-to-be, Iâ€™ve been taking care of family business and making sure we all eat well, with a healthy diet of good foods,â€ he said. â€œAnd we are all getting good sleep each night.â€

Maria Menounos & Keven Undergaro

After a more than 10-year-long fertility journey, Maria Menounos and Keven Underago are pregnant.

â€œJust after a decade of trying everything, we are so grateful to the beautiful family helping us conceive our baby,â€ Menounos told PEOPLE. â€œKeven, my dad and I are all beyond excited for this soul to come into our lives. What a blessing.â€

The TV host, 44 and her husband, 55 started IVF treatments in 2012 and started considering surrogacy in 2018 with advice from Kim Kardashian. Kardashian has had two children, Chicago 5 and Psalm, 4, via surrogate.

The couple has one other egg ready and hope to have two children.

â€œHopefully all will be well and weâ€™ll get two little brats that I will tell every day, â€˜You have no idea what we went through to bring you here! You better do great things in this world,'â€ she told PEOPLE with a laugh.

Rose Leslie & Kit Harington

On Feb 3, Kit Harington announced on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon that he and Rose Leslie are welcoming a second child together! The two already share one son together (whose name they havenâ€™t revealed), and apparently, heâ€™s not too thrilled about the new addition.

â€œHeâ€™s about to get the shock of his life. Which is that heâ€™s about to get a brother or sister,â€ he said. â€œIâ€™m not sure heâ€™s quite conceptually understood it just yet. Weâ€™re trying to get him ready for it. We point to Roseâ€™s tummy and say, â€˜Mummyâ€™s baby, mummyâ€™s baby.â€™ And he points at his tummy and goes, â€˜My baby.'â€

Meghan Trainor & Daryl Sabara

Meghan Trainor announced in late January via Instagram that she and husband Daryl Sabara are expecting baby #2 this summer! Joining big brother Riley, who turns two in February 2022, the newest addition will be a much-anticipated arrival. Trainor has been very vocal about her desire for another baby, telling PEOPLE in December, â€œIâ€™m trying to make four children, so Iâ€™ve got to get on it!â€

But Trainorâ€™s not only expecting a baby â€” sheâ€™s expecting a baby book! Her pregnancy guide, Dear Future Mama: A TMI Guide to Pregnancy, Birth, and Motherhood from Your Bestie, will be released in April 2023 (but you can preorder now!). What an exciting time for the Trainor-Sabara family!

Shemar Moore & Jesiree Dizon

During a January episode of The Jennifer Hudson Show, actor Shemar Moore dropped a bombshell: â€œIâ€™m Shemar Moore, 52Â½ years old. My mother is in heaven, right now itâ€™ll be the three-year anniversary on February 8,â€ he said. â€œAnd on February 8, Iâ€™m going to make one of her dreams come true because, in real life, Shemar Moore is about to be a daddy.â€

To wild applause, he confessed that he had begun to worry he was past Daddy age. â€œI was worried for a while that it was a â€˜that ship has sailed,â€™ kind of thing but God had my back and things lined up.â€

After breaking the news, Moore and his pregnant girlfriend Jesiree Dizon shared a sex reveal video on Instagram (with wall decor featuring the adorable saying â€œA Little Mooreâ€). Billows of pink smoke coming from a helicopter overhead revealed that the couple will be expecting a daughter!

Claire Danes & Hugh Dancy

Claire Danes and Hugh Dancy are expecting their third baby! Their rep confirmed the baby news to PEOPLE yesterday. They are already parents to Cyrus Michael Christopher, 10, and Rowan, 4.

The four-time Golden Globe winner, who was recently nominated for another Golden Globe for her work in Fleishman Is in Trouble, has talked about the hard parts about motherhood before.

In an interview with Harperâ€™s Bazaar U.K. in 2014, Danes said, â€œBeing a mum is incredibly challenging, but we still feel a pressure to talk about it in very romantic terms. And itâ€™s not just that,â€ she said. â€œWe all have that resentment at times and anxiety about being trapped by the role, that responsibility. And then chemically it can run riot. And thereâ€™s no â€˜offâ€™ button. That was the hardest adjustment. You always feel beholden to somebody. And for so long [kids are] like koala bears; you just feel a physical responsibility to be there for them to cling to. Itâ€™s pretty primal.â€

Chrissy Teigen & John Legend

Chrissy Teigen and John Legend brought the world to tears with the news that theyâ€™re expecting another child! Teigen took to Instagram to share the incredible news, posting two photos of her growing baby bump captioned, â€œThe last few years have been a blur of emotions to say the least, but joy has filled our home and hearts again.â€

The model and entertainment personality continued, â€œ1 billion shots later (in the leg lately, as u can see!) we have another on the way. Every appointment Iâ€™ve said to myself, â€˜ok if itâ€™s healthy today Iâ€™ll announceâ€™ but then I breathe a sigh of relief to hear a heartbeat and decide Iâ€™m just too nervous still.â€

â€œI donâ€™t think Iâ€™ll ever walk out of an appointment with more excitement than nerves but so far, everything is perfect and beautiful and Iâ€™m feeling hopeful and amazing,â€ she shared, virtually exclaiming, â€œOk phew itâ€™s been very hard keeping this in for so long!â€

The married couple also shares a daughter, Luna, and two sons, Miles and Jack. Jack tragically passed away in September 2020, with Teigen suffering a stillbirth â€” a journey she vulnerably and powerfully shared with the world.
